title: [K-12] Mobile Education Course on Object-Oriented Programming Using Integrated Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational programming syntax comprehension and algorithmic concepts mastery
context.additional_context: Operating Moodle LMS optimized for mobile environments, with VR simulations provided in a lightweight version compatible with smartphones

learning_goals: Learners can create simple program design documents utilizing core OOP concepts including classes, objects, inheritance, and polymorphism
Learners can solve OOP problems with over 80% accuracy using multimedia materials (videos, interactive quizzes) provided through the Moodle platform
Learners can implement and debug object interaction scenarios in VR-based simulation environments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
